steps: Viewpoint: Verify that Sponsor (by CAN) is able to create new single voucher by CAN after clicking "Save" button
Description: Confirm sponsor's ability to create a new voucher using CAN and save it

4. Enter all mandatory fields with data: + Direct Credit Option: Card + CAN: 8000080000000046 + Voucher Amount (in cents): 20000 + Order Number: 50 + Order Description: test AI 4. Click on "Save" button
5. Click the gift box icon (Voucher) 6. From the dropdown, select "Enquiry (CAN)" 7. Enter CAN ID: 8000080000000046 then click "Search"
- Enquiry Voucher (by CAN) page is displayed
- The message "Voucher has been created successfully." is displayed after the creation
- New voucher will be searchable in the list of vouchers with voucher state = Created
